[Home](./index.md) &gt; [mutik](./mutik.md) &gt; [Store](./mutik.store.md)

## Store interface

Mutik Store

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Store<State> 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [get()](./mutik.store.get.md) | Get the current state. Do not use this inside of React, you should instead use [useSelector()](./mutik.useselector.md) |
|  [mutate(updater)](./mutik.store.mutate.md) | Immer-style updater function. |
|  [off(listener)](./mutik.store.off.md) | Unsubscribe a given listener function |
|  [on(listener)](./mutik.store.on.md) | Subscribe to store. Pass in a callback function that will be executed on updates. on() returns the unsubscribe function for your convenience. |
|  [reset()](./mutik.store.reset.md) | Set state back to the initialState used when creating the store |
|  [set(nextState)](./mutik.store.set.md) | Set state. This can either take a new value or and updater function (just like <code>React.useState</code>'s updater) |
|  [set(updater)](./mutik.store.set_1.md) | Set state. This can either take a new value or and updater function (just like <code>React.useState</code>'s updater) |
